name: Alex's Christmas Party
description:
DESCRIPTION

Welcome, welcome back to Alex's school of biology and zoology! This time, Alex is hosting a Christmas Party! Where you will still do Biology!

This place is still full of fun! We have a lot of ways to spend time! We cave a big garden begind school, beautiful bushes, t͠rees, fe̢nce͝s, s̷n̶o̴w̶, d̷̸̀͢͢ớ͜͞ǫ̧̕͢ŕ̨̕s̛͘͏, c̡̨ĺ̀͘͢a̢̡͜s̶̀͢͏s̵ŗ̸̵̧́o̴̸͞͏ó̴͞ḿ̵̕͢͢s̸̨͢, k̨̛̀̕̕͟͠i̸̛͘͘͢͞n̷̢͞͏d͏̶̨̢̀͠͠͠ ̸̀͞s̸̵͟͞ţ̴͠͏̨̢͝͏͝ą̶̕͘͠f̸̨̡̀f͢͢҉        and other fun things!!!

Our s̨̡̕t͘͝a҉́͘f̴͝f  is the best in the world! They are  still very fr͢͠͝iend͞҉ly̢, but also strict!

And get ready to the m̧͟os̸t̵   u̢̢͜͢҉̴͠n͢͝e͢xpe̴c̛҉͞ţ͡e͏͢͢͞҉͘d̡̢҉̴̶̢̡̀     e̕҉̵̶ͮ̚͟ǹ̴͞͠d̨̨̢̡ͪ̈́̇ͪ̆̇ͮ̂͢͝i̷̵̸̢̡̾͊̃̀ͫ́̀̑ͪ̉ͩ͗́̀̕͜͠nͫġ̨ͧ̇͘͏̋̽͏҉̸̸ͫͮ̚       you ever seen!

Always and never forget to  s͠m̨i͟͏le̛͏̡ ̨̀ and  la̧̧͜͡͡҉̶̶͡͏̴̨͝҉̴̷̢̛͘͜͢͞͝҉̶̢̨̢̛̀͘̕̕͞͠͠͝͝ừ̶̷̶̷̸̢̢̢̨̧̢̡̀́͘͡͞͡͡g̷̢̛͢h̶̢́̕͟͠hh̶̛͏hh̛h̢̨̢h͜͜h̡hhhh̴̡͠h̴̀hhhhh̕hhh͏̡͠hh̶͡͞h͟͝h҉hh̸͏hhh҉h̴͟hhhhh̛̀͞hhhhhhhhhh̕hhh̡͡hhh҉̨҉hh͏͡h͘hhhh͏h̡͜͠hh̶͜͠h͜͢͝hh͏h̢͏́ḩ̸̵hh͢͠h̸̕҉h̷͟hhhhh̶̵́h͘͝hhh̵..................................

CONTROLS

W A S D - move

Left Mouse Button - use selected item

E - use object, use selected item on object or pickup item

Q R - look from corner

Left Shift - run

END - restart level

ESC - exit

Mouse Wheel \ 1, 2, 3, 4 - select inventory slot
